name: Talent Show
description:
It is a 3D online party game I designed and developed with unity in 2022. Players fall into a candy oasis and they need to get the target item to escape. 

The main gameplay mechanics of Talent Show are: getting skills from mystery boxes, using skills to disturb others, and finally leading the team occupy the central turntable to win the game. 

I’ll add more scenes and skills to this game, set different victory conditions for different types of level, improve the elimination mechanism, and conduct further test in the future.
